mapper.select: SELECT M.ID, U.NAME, U.BIRTH, U.PHONE, U.JOINDATE, R.ROLE FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.ID=U.ID INNER JOIN ROLE R ON M.ID=R.ID ORDER BY JOINDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADMIN_INFO(ID, NAME, BIRTH, GENDER, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS, J_PART, J_LEVEL) VALUES(#{id}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{j_part}, #{j_level})
